context: Based on the security incident reported, there was a follow-up alert indicating suspicious activities involving sequences of window commands used to identify assets and plan lateral movements within the network. This was related to a suspected DCSync attack on 2024-07-10, where `Luciano Herrera` (CIO) on `MB-WINCLIENT` sent a replication request to MB-DC1.
question: Who is the CIO involved in the suspected DCSync attack, and what is the name of the machine from which the replication request was sent?
solution_steps: The user with SID `S-1-5-21-561436748-3867387497-1732241745-3701` received an email with a malicious URL which was later removed.
A user with AadUserId `2de70991-2799-4a95-b734-8e3df3a50118` engaged in a suspicious sequence of exploration activities to identify valuable assets and coordinate lateral movement.
Luciano Herrera (CIO) on MB-WINCLIENT sent a DCSync attack replication request to MB-DC1.
